about.title: About
about.tagline: Your secure digital vault for managing, storing, and recovering Web3 wallets. We are building the bridge between accessibility and blockchain-grade security.
about.mission.title: Our Mission
about.mission.body: At Web3Vault, our mission is to empower individuals and businesses to take full control of their digital assets â€” securely, privately, and effortlessly. We believe in a decentralized future where security meets simplicity.
about.values.title: Our Core Values
about.values.securityFirst.title: Security First
about.values.securityFirst.desc: We prioritize user safety with enterprise-grade encryption and zero-knowledge design.
about.values.transparency.title: Transparency
about.values.transparency.desc: Our operations and architecture are open, auditable, and community-driven.
about.values.innovation.title: Innovation
about.values.innovation.desc: We continuously build smarter, faster, and safer ways to interact with Web3.
about.values.simplicity.title: Simplicity
about.values.simplicity.desc: Managing wallets and backups should be effortless â€” and we make it so.
about.values.trust.title: Trust
about.values.trust.desc: We earn it through reliability, integrity, and user-centered design.
about.values.decentralization.title: Decentralization
about.values.decentralization.desc: Empowering individuals by removing unnecessary intermediaries.

secure.hero.subtitle: Securely access your digital assets, manage your tokens, and explore Web3Vault's decentralized features â€” all in one connection.
secure.why.title: Why Connect Your Wallet?
secure.why.card1.title: Seamless Access
secure.why.card1.desc: Instantly access your decentralized identity and digital assets in seconds.
secure.why.card2.title: Enhanced Security
secure.why.card2.desc: Your assets stay under your control. We never store private keys or credentials.
secure.why.card3.title: Unified Experience
secure.why.card3.desc: Use one connection to access NFTs, DeFi, staking, and crypto tools.
secure.how.title: How It Works
secure.how.step1.title: Choose Your Wallet
secure.how.step1.desc: Select from trusted providers like MetaMask, WalletConnect, or Coinbase Wallet.
secure.how.step2.title: Authorize Connection
secure.how.step2.desc: Your wallet will ask for permission to connect securely and transparently.
secure.how.step3.title: Start Exploring
secure.how.step3.desc: Access all your Web3Vault tools, from staking to asset recovery.
secure.cta.title: Ready to Secure Your Web3 Experience?
secure.cta.desc: Connect your wallet today and unlock the full power of decentralized finance, ownership, and asset security with Web3Vault.
connect.title: Secure Your Wallet
connect.subtitle: Refers to protecting assets, data, and transactions. Choose platforms with encryption & MFA.
connect.modal.note: Note!! All your information and details are end-to-end encrypted on Web3
connect.form.title: Connect {wallet}
connect.success.title: Backup Successful
connect.success.desc: Your wallet data has been successfully backed up! We've securely stored your information, ensuring your assets remain protected. Feel free to continue managing your wallet or explore additional features.
